DOC.brief_summary: The propose study 6 week open-label clinical trial Seroquel XR add selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) medication treatment depressive and/or anxiety symptom . Each subject self-report change symptom , functional impairment , etc . twice daily basis use handheld computer ( HHC ) transmit real-time symptom report central database . Each subject assess in-person weekly biweekly basis course study .
DOC.brief_title: Identifying Very Early Response Seroquel Extended Release ( XR ) Augmentation Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: This study 6-week open-label clinical trial Seroquel XR add antidepressant medication treatment MDD without comorbid generalize anxiety disorder . Patients currently experience depressive episode respond adequate trial antidepressant eligible participate . During course augmentation treatment Seroquel XR , subject regularly enter information symptom severity functional impairment handheld computer , information wirelessly transmit central database .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis major depressive disorder , currently depress without comorbid generalize anxiety disorder determine DSMIV diagnostic criterion ( confirm use MINI ) 2 . Outpatient status 3 . 17item Hamilton Depression Rating Scale ( HAMD ) score ≥ 18 4 . Treatment follow antidepressant medication past 4 week minimum therapeutic dose 1 . Diagnosis past current bipolar disorder 2 . Current psychotic symptom 3 . Substanceinduced mood disorder 4 . Substance alcohol dependence 5 . Prominent current suicidal ideation define HAMD item 3 ( suicide item ) score ≥ 3 6 . Current treatment one antidepressant medication 7 . Current treatment tricyclic ( TCA ) antidepressant monoamine oxidase inhibitor ( MAOI ) 8 . A patient Diabetes Mellitus ( DM )
